1010001100111000 1011111011011101 1 -> sum: 0110001000010110, cout: 1
1100001111101000 1100000001000010 1 -> sum: 1000010000101011, cout: 1

0111110101110001 1000010010010101 0 -> sum: 0000001000000110, cout: 1
1001101100010000 1010010111110101 0 -> sum: 0100000100000101, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
